column6:
Put your thinking caps on, you naughty children. MATH TIME!!! Try to solve this equation: Corrupt policeman + giant, hungry robot ÷ Manhattan clam chowder × (origin of The Captain - logic) + Y + a chair³= YOUR FAVORITE BOOK. Solve for "Y". Nope. Y ≠ a 1979 Volkswagon Rabbit. Y = explosions. HAVEN'T YOU BEEN PAYING ATTENTION?,2006,4


32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
